title: Chief Accounting
description:
Sebagai seorang Chief Accountant, beberapa tugas dan tanggung jawabnya adalah sebagai berikut:

Mengelola tim akuntansi perusahaan dan memastikan laporan keuangan yang akurat dan tepat waktu
Menyusun dan mengelola anggaran perusahaan
Memastikan kepatuhan perusahaan terhadap regulasi akuntansi dan peraturan pemerintah
Menyiapkan dan menyajikan laporan keuangan untuk manajemen dan pemangku kepentingan
Menganalisis data keuangan dan memberikan rekomendasi untuk meningkatkan kinerja perusahaan
Menyusun laporan keuangan tahunan dan memastikan bahwa audit dilakukan dengan benar
Memimpin proyek-proyek strategis yang berkaitan dengan keuangan perusahaan
Memastikan keamanan dan kerahasiaan data keuangan perusahaan
Memperkuat sistem pengendalian intern untuk memastikan keakuratan dan integritas laporan keuangan
Chief Accountant juga memiliki wewenang untuk membuat keputusan yang berkaitan dengan keuangan perusahaan, seperti mengajukan anggaran atau investasi besar-besaran.

title: Staff Engineering
description:
echnician / engineering staff secara umum bertugas memastikan kelancaran operasi hal-hal yang berhubungan dengan instalasi, mesin, bangunan dan fasilitas bangunan.

Adapun tugas technician / engineering staff yang lebih detail adalah sebagai berikut:

Pemeliharaan serta perbaikan seluruh instalasi, mesin, bangunan dan fasilitas-fasilitas gedung lainnya.
Menangani segala peralatan, mesin, serta instalasi lainnya yang menggunakan tenaga listrik, air, maupun gas.
Melakukan penghematan energi dalam segala aktivitas.
Mencegah mesin, alat, instalasi, dan bangunan terhadap bahaya kebakaran maupun situasi lain yang membahayakan pengguna bangunan.
Menyiapkan keperluan listrik, gas, dan air secara teratur serta melaporkannya.
Menangani pekerjaan yang bersifat umum seperti mengecat.

title: Backend Developer
description:
We are looking for an analytical, results-driven back-end developer who will work with team members to troubleshoot and improve current back-end applications and processes. The Back-end Developer will use his or her understanding of programming languages and tools to analyze current codes and industry developments, formulate more efficient processes, solve problems, and create a more seamless experience for users. You should have excellent communication, computer, and project management skills.

To succeed as a backend developer, you should be focused on building a better, more efficient program and creating a better end-user experience. You should be knowledgeable, collaborative, and motivated.

Back-end Developer Responsibilities:
Compile and analyze data, processes, and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify areas for improvement.
Collaborating with the front-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience.
Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features by monitoring industry developments and trends.
Recording data and reporting it to proper parties, such as clients or leadership.
Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members.
Taking lead on projects, as needed.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
In the junior software developer role, you will help create programs and participate in test runs. You will be expected to have an in-depth knowledge of common programming languages. You will also be part of a paired programming group to complete tasks with senior developers. Success in this role will be demonstrated by delivering critical code to help ensure applications are up-to-date and fully functional.

- Works on minor bug issues
- Writes reports regarding the state of software under development
- Conducts development tests
- Monitors the performance of internal systems
- Attends daily developer meetings
- Analyzes user needs and software requirements to inform system design

title: Bartender
description:
We are looking for an enthusiastic Bartender to provide an excellent guest drinking experience. Good Bartenders will be able to create classic and innovative drinks exceeding customers’ needs and expectations. Compensation includes salary and tips. 

Responsibilities :
Prepare alcohol or non-alcohol beverages for bar and restaurant patrons
Interact with customers, take orders and serve snacks and drinks
Assess customers’ needs and preferences and make recommendations
Mix ingredients to prepare cocktails
Plan and present bar menu
Check customers’ identification and confirm it meets legal drinking age
Restock and replenish bar inventory and supplies
Stay guest focused and nurture an excellent guest experience
Comply with all food and beverage regulations

title: Management Trainee
description:
Completing all assigned tasks and assisting with day-to-day operations.
Participating in meetings, workshops, and other learning opportunities.
Observing and learning from experienced staff members.
Gaining knowledge of company policies, protocols, and processes.
Taking detailed notes and liaising with Managers, Supervisors, and other senior staff.
Fulfilling any requirements and meeting goals set out at the start of the traineeship.
Following all company regulations, and health and safety codes.
Preparing documents and updating records.
Learning about conflict resolution and sitting in on disciplinary hearings.
Traveling to different offices and participating in daily operations as required.
